markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, there are ten right ways. What ten? Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom. These are the ten right ways.”

AN.10.134. Sādhusutta (“Good”)

children.value:
“Mendicants, there are ten right ways.
What ten?
Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
These are the ten right ways.”
